title: Leader of Club, can't wear tag name.
body:
I'm the leader of a club but I can't wear the tag. Everyone else can wear it but I can't? The gear icon is greyed out.
Club name: SKTles

replies.body: Those clubs can be a little fussy every once and awhile. I had to poke it with a stick a little, but you should be able to see that club now ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oj9VXJA8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-23T01:54:55.196+0000)
>
> Those clubs can be a little fussy every once and awhile. I had to poke it with a stick a little, but you should be able to see that club now ^_^!

Hello Poro,

Was the club buggy or did they not set it as their primary?
Sometimes those clubs just go a little wonky, and we need to give them a little poke to wake 'em up!
My clubs name is Basically LCS and I can't access it as the leader and the tag is intermittent. My SN: Space Cow
Hey dude, i'm the owner of my club and yet it does not show that I am in any clubs whenever I log on. Please help me out, ty!
Shoot me the name of that club and I can check it as well!
Oh sweet tnx, the name of our club is "AkagiiRedSuns" and the clan tag is "AkRs"
You should be able to see it now ^_^!
Ooooohhh snap I see it! You're awesome, cheers for that one mate :D

Hi 4w,

Did you make sure to set that club as your active club and set the option to display the tag?
